text:
@JoeBiden With due respect
Alarming to see minds shift from things we already know to be true.

Masks meant for task use
People being made & kept sick from extended use.

Heat moisture humidity countless pathogens including #coronavirus back into respiratory track 
#Florence Nightingale

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
